ingredients.content: 6 oz yams, peeled, cut into pieces (1 in.)
3 oz carrots, peeled, cut into pieces (2 in.)
3 oz butternut squash, peeled, cut into pieces (2 in.)
1 oz fresh baby spinach, finely chopped

preparations.content: Place sweet potato, carrots, squash and Brussels sprouts into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add broccoli, spinach and orzo and cook a further <b>8 min/212°F/speed 1<b>.
Allow to cool to room temperature before serving or freeze in individual portions.
